title: [LOW] Improve Accessibility
body:
## Problem Poor accessibility - no ARIA labels, keyboard navigation, or screen reader support. ## Issues - ❌ No ARIA labels - ❌ No keyboard navigation - ❌ No screen reader support - ❌ Poor color contrast in some areas - ❌ No focus indicators - ❌ Non-semantic HTML ## Recommendation ```bash npm install -D eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y ``` **Examples:** ```javascript // Buttons // Forms {errors.name && ( {errors.name} )} // Modals

Delete Object

Are you sure?

// Navigation
  • Dashboard
``` ## Target - WCAG 2.1 AA compliance - Lighthouse accessibility score > 90 - Full keyboard navigation - Screen reader tested ## Effort ⏱️ **2 weeks** ## Phase **Phase 4 - Low Priority** 🟢 --- **Metadata:** - **Effort:** 2 weeks - **Dependencies:** None ## Reference - `ARCHITECTURE_REVIEW.md` - Issue #24 - `REFACTORING_ROADMAP.md` - Phase 4
